name: Ariel
info: A Sinner who is adept at supporting allies. Increase Energy Recovery Speed by 10%.
criminalRecord:
Covered up the existence of [[[Mania |Maniacs]]] in [[[Eastside]]] and provided Maniacs with help, leading to considerable contamination risk to Eastside. After such crimes were exposed, the subject intentionally obstructed the [[[Framework Against Catastrophe |FAC's]]] law enforcement and even assaulted FAC officials with special power. Although no casualties resulted, the subject's refusal to comply with an identity check suggests other intentions for the coverup of Maniacs, and stricter interrogations are thus required.

--

The subject has been identified as the daughter of the Spencer family after her arrest. Interrogation reveals that the subject harbored Mania patients entirely out of sympathy and //excessive charity//.

Due to her special identity, the Bureau has attempted a negotiation with the Spencers. All in all, the family seems to have already given up on the subject, so she'll be officially put under the MBCC's management from now on.
mutationAssessment:
+++* Ability Summary

The balls of light released with the power speed up the refilling of energy gaps in cells, accelerating small wound recovery in the target organism as well as curing most physical injuries and diseases.

+++* Awakening Signs

During frequent contact with maniacs, the body's self-preservation instinct kicked in and unconsciously induced an awakening in the subject.

+++* Corruption State

The corruption level is low. With the unique recovery ability, the subject has only been insignificantly impacted by the Mania and no apparent signs have been detected.
ecbFlavourText:
"She's not dead?! Then the one in the coffin is..."
"The Saintess! The Saintess has been resurrected! She will surely forgive us!"
interrogation1:
Although Ariel appears meek and naive, the Chief doesn't rule out the possibility that she might be dangerous, asking why she interfered with FAC operations. Ariel, apologetic, describes how FAC operatives cornered and harassed a young Maniac girl. Filled with a strong desire to protect her, Ariel awakened as a Sinner, using her powers to buy the girl time to escape. The Chief brings up the Spencer family's hostile stance against Mania, to which Ariel replies that she doesn't think people should be judged based on class or health. As she continues on the topic of her father, she spirals into self-loathing, but the Chief assures her that her abilities will be a great help to DisCity. Ariel asks the Chief to repeat what they said, and the Chief once again affirms that she isn't a liability to others. Ariel breaks down crying, saying she's never been told anything like this, and realizes that she can exist for her own sake instead of for the Spencers. After settling down, she asks the Chief if she can go see her father.

Do "Sins" really equal "Sinners"? This question had a new answer when Ariel showed up. Perhaps this seemingly spoiled girl hailing from a rich family has a heart clearer and more resolute than anyone else.
interrogation2:
The Chief takes Ariel to the Spencer estate in the guise of a local sheriff, cautioning her against revealing their identity or her own as a Sinner. Ariel suspects that her father, Ganson, won't care about the fact that she's been missing for days. Indeed, Ganson shows no concern about the state of her health, and it soon becomes clear that he only values her for her ability to benefit the family name. In a last ditch effort to get his recognition, Ariel creates a glowing orb with her Sinner abilities. Ganson immediately becomes hostile, disowning her and threatening to shoot her. The Chief tries to stand up for Ariel to no avail, watching as Ganson fires on his own daughter. One shot hits Ariel in the shoulder, causing her powers to run wild. She deflects a second shot with the ball of light and instinctively knocks the gun from Ganson's hand. Ganson takes this as more evidence for Sinners' violent nature, and the wounded Ariel ushers the Chief outside. She asks if the Chief could make her father believe that she died from the gunshot wound. The Chief asks her if this was her intent all along, and Ariel passes out from blood loss before she can reply.

Ariel's father is more cold-hearted and extreme than you expected. Apparently, Ariel was anticipating her father to react that way. She is here this time not to visit her family but to bid them farewell.
interrogation3:
As the two stand over Ariel's tombstone, Ariel thanks the Chief for issuing her obituary. With the procession still off in the distance, she wonders if her father feels guilty about what he did, and if that she, too, has a despicable side, having used such extreme measures to get his attention. The Chief assures her that what she did is nothing compared to Ganson's ruthlessness. They then apologize for being suspicious of her back in the interrogation room, and Ariel replies that she simply thought they would believe her if she was truthful. Noticing the procession approaching, the Chief tells Ariel that they should leave. Ariel, after a final long look at the estate, says that they should go home. Later, the Chief informs Ariel that the girl she saved, Shan, managed to escape safely to Syndicate. Ariel, now assisting the medical team, is ecstatic that she finally managed to help someone, only to hear a crack from one of the test tubes she mistakenly put in the freezer.

The FAC didn't make it explicit, but they agreed with your decision. The Spencers and the rescued Maniacs stay out of this. Behind this seemingly happy ending, the only victim is Ariel who has to leave behind her family name and everything in the past, trying to start a new life in a hurry.
arrestRec1: Awakened while resisting the FAC's law enforcement. Unable to control their power at the time, the subject was easily subdued and immediately escorted to the [[[Minos Bureau of Crisis Control |MBCC]]] for further investigation.
arrestRec2: The subject has hosted or taken part in over a hundred charity events since childhood and has a good reputation in Eastside. Many used to come specifically to claim relief materials after hearing about the beauty and kindness of the young Miss Spencer.
arrestRec3: The youngest daughter of the prestigious Spencer family, the subject has many elder siblings. She has received aristocratic private education since childhood and has dipped into the piano, dance, and painting, yet is versed in none. The subject therefore had a low status in the family and was often neglected.
arrestRec4: The subject doesn't wish to affect the family with her Sinner identity and has forsaken the family name, merely joining the MBCC as the Chief's assistant. Kept in the dark, the Spencer family mistook that the subject had died and held a grand funeral, which many of the Eastside's rich and powerful attended to mourn her passing.
servingTerm1: The subject has lost her way multiple times in the Bureau. Once, the subject intruded into the [[[Chief |Chief's]]] private space accidentally and was so mortified by it that she requested punishment. After the staff customized a map for the subject, she seems to get lost less often now.
servingTerm2: Has no concept of money and once spent close to ten thousand DisCoins on bird food to save frail birds. Feeling deeply guilty after knowing about the difficulties it brought to the Supply Office, the subject voluntarily took up first-aid duties and promised to overachieve to compensate for it.
servingTerm3: Thoughts on the subject are polarized among the Sinners. Most people appreciate her kind and easygoing nature, but a small number of Sinners are annoyed by her excessive sympathy and feel humiliated by it.
servingTerm4: The subject's father has had multiple negotiations with the MBCC to regain his daughter's custody, but the subject has rejected the requests personally. According to some staff, Ariel turned down her father's requests because she'd rather stay beside the Chief than become a tool for political marriage.
emotionCheck1:
[Now that the mission is over, Ariel comes to apologize to you.]

**Ariel:** I think I am‚Ä¶ always a burden to everyone...

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Keep up the good work.
 * **Ariel:** Sorry‚Ä¶ I'll double the effort.
 * **Ariel:** üò´

* **Prompt:** You give everyone power. Don't give up.
 * **Ariel:** I hope you will all give me another chance.
 * **Ariel:** üòò
emotionCheck2:
[Ariel seems disturbed and uneasy.]

**Ariel:** Why is everyone always staring at me‚Ä¶?

**Chief:** ......

* **Prompt:** Perhaps it‚Äôs because you attract too much attention.
 * **Ariel:** Is‚Ä¶ Is it true? I‚Äôll keep up the good work!
 * **Ariel:** üòòüòò

* **Prompt:** Perhaps it‚Äôs because the Spencers are too famous.
 * **Ariel:** ...Sigh. My siblings are doing great. But I'm not one of them.
 * **Ariel:** üòê
supervision1:
++* ‚ö† Encouragement

//Ariel's recent behaviors are causing the employees trouble.//

**System Notifications:** Ariel has been helping people but also causing people trouble. This bothers the employees. They don't know if they should let her stay and help.

* **Prompt:** Let her stay.
supervision2:
++* ‚ö† Even Weeds Deserves Love!

//The weeds in the Bureau are growing and thriving.//

**System Notifications:** Some harmful weeds that was going to wither came back to life and thrived because Ariel cared for all the plants indiscriminately.

* **Prompt:** Hold a picnic on the grass
supervision3:
++* ‚ö† Relic

//Ariel's dress looks stunning as always.//

**System Notifications:** Ariel asks to wear a simpler gown that won't draw as much attention.

* **Prompt:** Approve
supervision4:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Piano Music

//You noticed that Ariel kept staring at the piano.//

**System Notifications:** You noticed that Ariel kept staring at the piano.

**Chief:** Why have you been staring at that piano?

**Ariel:** Well... It looks like the one in my home.

**Ariel:** I'd like to give it a try.

**Chief:** I look forward to enjoying your performance.

**Ariel:** But... I'm not very good at playing.

**Ariel:** There are many people here... I feel... kind of nervous.

**Chief:** Do you come here often?

**Ariel:** Huh? I... I do... I come here to practice playing the piano at night when there are fewer people around.

* **Prompt:** Next time, be sure to hit me up.

**Chief:** I too would like to be your audience, Ariel.

**Ariel:** Okay... But please don't laugh at me if I don't play very well.
supervision5:
++* ‚ö†‚ö† Why Are You Crying Again?

//Ariel has been using the Training Room quite often lately.//

**System Notifications:** Ariel has been using the Training Room quite often lately.

**Ariel:** "This... This is my determination!"

**Chief:** Ariel, are you still training?

**Ariel:** Chief!

**Ariel:** I-I don't want to be a burden anymore...

**Ariel:** I must grow stronger the fastest I can!

* **Prompt:** You didn't slow me down.
* **Prompt:** You did very well.

**Chief:** Your healing power saved many people.

**Ariel:** Really? Am I not a burden then?

**Chief:** Of course not.

**Ariel:** Sob...

**Ariel:** Hearing you say this, Chief, has made me so... happy!

**Ariel:** Waaah... *Crying
supervision6:
++* ‚ö†‚ö†‚ö† Charity Performance

//Ariel wants to donate some money to children in [[[Syndicate]]].//

**System Notifications:** The news is showing some recent footage of Syndicate. Some children have lost their homes due to gang fights.

**System Notifications:** Ariel is staring at the TV bleakly, wiping her eyes with the back of her hand.

* **Prompt:** Approach and comfort her

**Ariel:** Oh, Chief? Sorry, I didn't mean to let you see me like this.

**Ariel:** In the past, I always tried to help these children through charity work.

**Ariel:** But since I left my family recently, I've found that I can do nothing on my own...

* **Prompt:** I'll help you.

**System Notifications:** You suggest that Ariel organize a charity show in the Bureau. After all, she has a lot of experience in this.

**Ariel:** Can I really? Thank you, Chief! What an excellent idea!

**Ariel:** In fact... I play the piano too. I can prepare a performance myself.

**Ariel:** Leave it to me this time!

**System Notifications:** Under Ariel's coordination, the Sinners organize a charity show.

**System Notifications:** Though there are a few accidents here and there, the event comes to a perfect end.

**System Notifications:** Afterward, you and Ariel count the money raised and find that it's less than expected.

**System Notifications:** After all, Sinners detained by the Bureau don't have much disposable funds.

**Ariel:** The amount raised is kind of small... Perhaps I didn't do a good job as the organizer. I'll try harder next time!

* **Prompt:** What matters is their kindness.
 * **Ariel:** Is that true? Perhaps you're right, Chief.
 * **Ariel:** At the charity events I organized in the past, people only cared about showing off at the evening parties.
 * **Ariel:** Almost no one cared about whether the funds raised were put to good use... Even I couldn't be sure.
 * **Ariel:** At least now, everyone is sincere. I'm sure... Syndicate will get better.
 * **Chief:** I'm sure it will.

* **Prompt:** I want to make a donation too.
 * **System Notifications:** You decide to ask for twelve months of your salary in advance and make a donation.
 * **Ariel:** What?! That's a lot of money! Chief, thank you!
 * **System Notifications:** Overjoyed, Ariel hugs you.
 * **System Notifications:** As for how to get by in the coming twelve months... You decide to go and learn some fasting skills and how to make two meals out of one bag of ramen noodles.
baseVoicelines:
[Obtain the Sinner]
I came crawling back after doing so many wrong things... Chief, please don't tell my father. I can't bring more shame to my family.

[Raise to Phase 1]
I don't want anyone else to get hurt.

[Raise to Phase 3]
This way, I can help alleviate more people's suffering. Sorry... you must have been waiting for a long time.

[Level Start]
Don't let go of my hand.

[Win Battles]
Thank you everyone for your hard work!

[Lose Battles]
I'm sorry, it's all my fault... I messed things up for everyone...

[Ultimate Skill]
This is my resolution!

[Die in Battles]
I still... can't do anything...

[Greeting]
Chief, you look tired. Want me to help you relax? I know a thing or two about relieving pressure.

[Conversation 1]
Why does everyone keep staring at my clothes? This is the most basic gown my family owns...

[Conversation 2]
I'm sorry, Chief... As a Sinner, I don't have any special combat skills, but I hope I can help others with my healing power. Even... even if I can help just a little bit.

[Conversation 3]
I'm a member of the Spencer family... but don't call me something pretentious like "my lady"... Call me Ariel.

[Special Conversation 1]
Chief... do you have any older siblings? It's exhausting to try to live up to talented siblings. Sometimes... I feel that it's hopeless no mattter how hard I try...

[Special Conversation 2]
Oh Corruptors... your bodies are rotting constantly, so you must feel a lot of pain. Your disfigurement and pain is worsening... I'm sorry, I will definitely try to become stronger to save you.

[Special Conversation 3]
Please don't stay up too late, it's not good for your health. Let me help you finish this work! Sigh... are you staying up late because I suck at my job? I'm sorry! It's all my fault!

[Full Compliance]
Please don't venture off too far from me on our next mission... If we get split up again, we'll become the laughing stock.

[Idle]
What can I do to help? Sigh... no! I cannot give up. I know I can succeed!

[Annoyed]
Chief... if I did anything wrong, please tell me directly... please... please don't be like this...

[Special Attention]
Huh? ... Chief, why are you staring at me like this? ... Did I do something wrong?

[Dispatch]
I will succeed this time!

[Dispatch Complete]
I hope I didn't embarrass the Spencer family...?

[Level Up]
I hope I can become an asset to you.

[Pat Head]
Hmm? Chief... your hand is a bit cold.
attireVoicelines1:
[Attire Obtained]
Can I really take this dress? Thank you, Chief. In return for your kindness... let me play a song for you.

[Greeting]
You look tired. Would you like to listen to some soothing music on the piano?

[Ordinary Contact 1]
Music... expresses a wide gamut of emotions. Well... I wonder if you felt my emotions, Chief?

[Ordinary Contact 2]
I can't help feeling a little nervous when I think about playing the piano in front of you...

[Ordinary Contact 3]
Chief... If you don't mind, will you play a duet with me?

[Ordinary Contact 4]
I often forget to release the right pedal when I'm nervous... Sorry, did it sound terrible?

[Idle] 
Hmm... Which song should I practice today... Would the Chief like this one?

[Special Attention] 
Oh? Do you want to hear something else...? Phew‚Äî‚ÄîI'm glad I have prepared other songs as well.

[Level Up}
I hope you like my performance.

[Pat Head]
Aw... I can't concentrate... like this...
attireVoicelines2:
[Attire Obtained]
Lush green gardens, grand golden halls, and... cramped rooms. (Sigh) This is the Spencer house, a place I can never leave.

[Greeting]
My mood always gets a lot better every time I see these flowers in my room.

[Ordinary Contact 1]
I've always wondered... if I'd run away from home and hid in where they have to search for one whole day, then, would they... care about me a little more?

[Ordinary Contact 2]
I've heard... that anyone or anything that got tainted with Mania will become the most evil beings in the world... But, they didn't become like that voluntarily, did they? They must be in pain too... If only I could help them...

[Idle] 
(Sigh) My big brothers and sisters are all so outstanding. I wish I could be like them...

[Annoyed]
How much longer will this monotonous life continue?

[Special Attention] 
At tomorrow's ball, I must bring out the best in me and do the Spencer family proud! Oh, I almost forgot to get my dress ready.

[Level Up}
It seems... I can see further out.
nightmareTalent: One allied Sinner's injured status is randomly removed for each Realm Stele incident triggered.

exclusiveCrimebrand.name: Pure White Funeral
exclusiveCrimebrand.description: When Ariel uses [Abyssal Glimmer], she creates an extra [Glimmer Realm] around herself, the healing effect of which decreases by 60%/55%/50%.
exclusiveCrimebrand.flavourText:
"She's not dead?! Then the one in the coffin is..."
"The Saintess! The Saintess has been resurrected! She will surely forgive us!"

crimebrandSets.name: Justice + Prologue
crimebrandSets.note: Increase team's Attack by 5% when Ariel ults.

crimebrandSets.name: Afterglow + Prologue
crimebrandSets.note: Boosts nearby allied Sinners' Attack by 10% after Ariel uses Ult. Although the Attack increase provided is larger than Justice, Afterglow does not apply mapwide, making it more difficult to use than Justice.

crimebrandSets.name: Energy
crimebrandSets.note: Provides Ariel start-up energy so you can have your first Ult ready quickly.

pros: Strong and fast AoE burst heal
S3 increases allied Sinners' Max HP

shackles.title: Empathy
shackles.description: All allied Sinners gain a 10% HP bonus.

shackles.title: Emotion Resonance
shackles.description: Ultimate Energy Consumption is reduced by 3 points.

skills.name: Mercy
skills.description: Ariel guides glimmer to attack, dealing (112% of Attack damage) Magic Damage each time.

skills.name: Abyssal Glimmer
skills.description: Light responds to Ariel's prayer, forming a [Glimmer Realm] in the target area. The Realm heals all allies within range 5 times, each restoring (90% of Ariel's Attack) HP.

skills.name: Heal Up
skills.description: During a battle, Ariel heals all allies within a 3x3 square around her, restoring (50% of Attack damage) HP to them. The effect has a 6-second cooldown.

skills.name: Benediction
skills.description: Allied within a [Glimmer Realm] recover 2% max HP for 10 seconds.

compliance: Unlocke File: Performance in Serving Term, Attack +4, HP +46
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 1, HP + 46, Attack + 4
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term
Unlock Voice: Special Conversation 3, Unlock Requirements: Complete Ariel's Review
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Sticker
Unlock File: Performance in Serving Term, Unlock Voice: Full Compliance, Unlock Sinner Title: Pity of the Shimmer
